member.name: P:messageController.logging.LogName
member.summary: Gets or sets the application's name.

member.name: P:messageController.logging.LogPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path of the log file.

member.name: P:messageController.logging.FileExtension
member.summary: Gets or sets the extension of the log file.

member.name: P:messageController.logging.MaximumFileSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size of the log file in Kilobytes.

member.name: P:messageController.logging.DateTimeFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the date/time format used to write the log file contents.

member.name: P:messageController.logging.DeclaringAssembly
member.summary: Gets or sets the declaring/calling assembly.

member.name: P:messageController.logging.WriteAssemblyInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets the value whether to write the assembly info or not.
